author: Rob Braxman Tech
description:
A week from now, Windows 10 will be considered to be at End-of-Life and chances are, those using it cannot upgrade to Windows 10 because of the hardware requirements of Windows 11. While you think it is a big and risky move to go to Linux, I will show you in this video why it is not. As a Windows expert for decades, I've left Windows long ago and Windows today is headed into a completely wrong direction. If you want to own your machine, instead of Microsoft owning you, make the switch now. This video will show you that it's not hard at all.

USB Boot Guide (for Common Computer Models)
https://brax.me/f/linux-boot.pdf/T4AZ68dd6b72d55db2.94667652

Dual Boot Linux and Windows (watch for a newer version of this video)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4VKoG0dKCOk

Brax Virtual Phone, De-Googled Phones, BytzVPN, BraxMail, B
title: Linux Will Work For You. Time to Dump Windows 10. And Don't Bother with Windows 11
